ll-eng sync=true
put k1 v1
put k2 v2
----
"k1" -> "v1"⚐
"k2" -> "v2"⚐

ll-eng
put k1 v1b
put k3 v3
----
"k1" -> "v1b"♱ "v1"⚐
"k2" -> "v2"⚐
"k3" -> "v3"♱

ll-eng
flush
----
"k1" -> "v1b"
"k2" -> "v2"
"k3" -> "v3"

ll-eng
del k1
----
"k1" -> "\x00"♱ "v1b"
"k2" -> "v2"
"k3" -> "v3"

ll-eng sync=true
----
"k1" -> "\x00"⚐ "v1b"
"k2" -> "v2"
"k3" -> "v3"

ll-eng
del k2
del k3
----
"k1" -> "\x00"⚐ "v1b"
"k2" -> "\x00"♱ "v2"
"k3" -> "\x00"♱ "v3"

ll-eng
flush
----
ok
